name: Rock Group
description:
ROCK Group Advertising, Branding and Interactive is a Miami-based award winning agency specializing in the development and implementation of creative and tech-savvy marketing campaigns. Designed as a one-stop-shop, the ROCK group provides all of its services in-house - from video and graphic design to website and mobile application development. ROCK Group also has a 2500 sq. ft studio along with a full complement of the latest in visual and audio capture arsenal.
We are a certified high definition video studio.
